content.question: Based on the above table which of the following is most likely correct?

choices.label: The natural rate of unemployment is 5 percent.
The labor force participation rate is 91 percent.
Discouraged workers are 4 percent of the labor force.
There are 9 million discouraged workers in the nation
There are 95 million people in the labor force

content.answer: The natural rate of unemployment is 5 percent.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
